pr_title: Bjorncs/tensor data type validation in config model

timeline.message: Verify that DocumentTypeChangeValidator detects tensor type changes

Reapply "Remove handling of tensor-type-change in AttributeChangeValidator"

This is no longer needed as tensor type now follows the field type, and such changes are handled in DocumentChangeValidator.

timeline.bodyText: I think this second test is redundant. You can remove it.
timeline.author: geirst
